duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales and marketing strategies to attract and retain memberships through channel partners, strategic alliances, chambers of commerce, and professional associations.
Lead and manage a team of 5-25 Executive Consultants, providing guidance and support to achieve sales goals and targets.
Deliver persuasive presentations and business credit seminars to groups of 5-50 business owners, both in-person and virtually.
Monitor and improve the sales performance of the team, implementing sales strategies and managing the sales process through the J. Galt Sales App.
Form strategic partnerships and alliances to increase memberships and business credit consulting opportunities.
Meet monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets, while continuously seeking personal development and career growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
